name: decltdi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)

comment: Comparing a digit to a decimal integer. (Contributed by AV, 8-Sep-2021.)
